Queries.GetQuoteDataByOrderNum: SELECT MyDoorOrderNum, LineItemPriceDescription, LineTotalPrice, QuoteTotalPrice FROM dbo.QuoteData WHERE MyDoorOrderNum = @OrderNum
Queries.DealerOrdersSearch: SELECT mdOrder.OrderId, mdSalesLead.SaleLeadId, mdSalesLead.FullName, mddealerconfig.DealerId, mddealerconfig.DealerName, mddealerconfig.OracleDealerId, mddealerconfig.DealerType, mdSalesLead.ProjectName AS SaleLead_ProjectName, mdSalesLead.Source AS SaleLead_Source, mdOrder.Source AS Order_Source, mdOrder.Configuration, mdOrder.Status, mdOrder.IntegrationXML, mduser.UserId, mduser.Username, mduser.Email, mdOrder.CreatedOn FROM [mydoor].[SalesLead] AS mdSalesLead INNER JOIN [mydoor].[Order] AS mdOrder ON mdSalesLead.SaleLeadId = mdOrder.SaleLeadId INNER JOIN [mydoor].[MyDoorUser] AS mdUser ON mdSalesLead.UserId = mdUser.UserId INNER JOIN [mydoor].[DealerConfiguration] mddealerconfig ON mdUser.DealerId = mddealerconfig.DealerId INNER JOIN [Admin].[ProjectStatus] adPs ON mdOrder.Status = adPs.Value WHERE mdOrder.Status NOT IN (1) AND (@OrderId IS NULL OR mdOrder.OrderId IN (@OrderId)) AND (@OracleDealerId IS NULL OR mddealerconfig.OracleDealerId = '59999') AND (@DealerName IS NULL OR mddealerconfig.DealerName LIKE '%' + @DealerName + '%') AND (@DealerId IS NULL OR mddealerconfig.DealerId = @DealerId) AND ((@CreatedOnStart IS NULL OR @CreatedOnEnd IS NULL) OR (mdOrder.CreatedOn BETWEEN @CreatedOnStart AND @CreatedOnEnd))
